issue.title: Isolated builds broken on default branch

content.raw:
@_jrivero_ ~~Those patches didn't work for me.~~

Never mind, working now, but doing more testing...

That patch works for `catkin_make_isolated`, but not `catkin_make_isolated --install`

UPDATE: the `drcsim_model_resources_DEVEL_PREFIX` variable is empty with isolated install builds.
